settings.text: At East Texas Electronics LLC, we strive to minimize the impact of electronic waste on the environment through responsible recycling practices.
We are committed to transparent and sincere customer support. No matter the issue, we will do everything we can to make it right.
We value your privacy and have implemented strong security measures to protect your data. Your private information is handled with the utmost care.
Experience the highest level of care for your repair and restoration devices. Trust us to handle them as if they were our very own.

Once upon a time, in the charming town of Hallsville, Texas, a visionary named Robert Havelaar saw a problem that troubled his tech-loving heart. He noticed an alarming amount of perfectly good computer components being discarded and left to rot in landfills. Determined to make a change, Robert embarked on a mission to give these neglected electronics a new lease on life.

 

On a crisp autumn day, November 1st, 2022, East Texas Electronics LLC. was born. With a passion for technology and a desire to provide exceptional customer service, Robert opened the doors of his one-stop shop for all things electronics. From the very beginning, he had a clear vision in mind: Reduce, Reuse, and Recycle.

 

Equipped with years of experience and a knack for both hardware and software repairs, Robert assembled a team of skilled technicians who shared his dedication to delivering top-notch service. Their mission was not only to fix devices but also to breathe new life into them, ensuring that functional components didn't go to waste.

 

East Texas Electronics quickly became the go-to destination for the local community seeking reliable repairs and the latest electronic gadgets. The business thrived, driven by Robert's unwavering commitment to sustainability and eco-friendly practices. He believed in the importance of taking responsible steps to reduce the e-waste footprint on our precious planet.

 

As the business grew, so did its range of services. East Texas Electronics expanded to offer custom PC builds, device cleaning, media conversion, and even ventured into the world of web development. Through it all, the core values of reduce, reuse, and recycle remained at the heart of everything they did.

 

Today, East Texas Electronics stands tall as a beacon of technological expertise, environmental consciousness, and exceptional customer service. The community knows that when they step through the doors, they're not only getting their devices repaired or purchasing the latest electronics but also contributing to a greater cause.

 

So, whether you find yourself in need of a repair, seeking the newest gadget, or simply sharing the vision of a sustainable future, East Texas Electronics welcomes you with open arms. Step inside, be part of the journey, and join Robert Havelaar and his dedicated team in the quest to reduce, reuse, and recycle. Together, we can make a difference, one device at a time.

 

Visit East Texas Electronics today and witness the remarkable story that started with a desire to make a change. Let's build a future where technology and sustainability go hand in hand.

Address:
205 Renaissance Drive Hallsville, Texas 75650

Hours:

Tuesday-Saturday: 10:00am - 6:00pm
